tool_description: Authentication validation and authorization details of the given user.
name: userdetail
title: userdetail

api_list.name: userdetail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://userdetail1.p.rapidapi.com/authuser/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "userdetail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://userdetail1.p.rapidapi.com/authuser/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "userdetail1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
